name: Custom Outfit of Choice Casual Wear Pageant Glitz
description:
Custom Pageant Wear
Can be worn as Outfit of Choice or Casual Wear
This Outfit can also be themed for a holiday, specific routine, or specific pageant.

Outfit is available in size 0,1,2,3,4,5,6
Or can be made to your measurements.
Please allow 1-2 weeks for production and shipping

Package includes:
Low Glitz
Muffin Hat
2 Matching Hair Bows
Halter Top
Pleat Skirt or circle skirt

Additional accessories also available :
Diaper cover / Bloomers $10
Socks $7
Boot covers $10
Arm Bands $15
Jewerly Set $15

Need more glitz? Contact me for a special listing.
Please visit me at www.mrccustomcreations
or message with with any questions

name: Custom Glitz Pageant Dress Made To Order
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS LISTING IS FOR YOUR DRESS DEPOSIT AND
TO HOLD YOUR SPOT ON MY CALENDAR
FINAL PAYMENT WILL BE BILLED BEFORE SHIPPING
DEPOSITS ARE NON REFUNDABLE, PRODUCTION OF YOUR DRESS
STARTS IMMEDIATELY AFTER PLACING YOUR ORDER.


All Dresses are Custom Made to Order, no two are alike

Choose from Cupcake skirt or southern skirt
Both made from high quality organza with a super stretch waistband. Available in many colors.

Choose your bodice style. Bodice is made of heavy super stretch with boning. I will work with you to create the perfect one of a kind dress.

The accessories included with the purchase of your dress include sock ruffles, a hair bow or headband and bloomers (for cupcake skirt).

Production of the dress is generally 4-6 weeks. If you need a dress sooner, please message me, I may be able to accommodate you. Shipping time will vary depending on your location. I offer any shipping method you choose. I can even overnight if needed.

Dresses can be made to your measurements or you can give me a general size and I will include all of the closures, snaps, hooks etc with your package for you to put on.

PRICING:
Low Glitz Dress (432 Rhinestones, some larger stones, simple details and applique)
Newborn - 24 months: $250
2T - 5T: $300
6 - 8: $350
9 - 12: $400
Long gowns: $500

Medium Glitz Dress (864 Rhinestones, brooch stones, large stones, details and applique)
Newborn - 24 months: $400
2T - 5T: $450
6 - 8: $500
9 - 12: $550
Long gowns: $650

High Glitz Dress (1440 AB Swarovski Rhinestones, brooch stones, larger stones, more details and appliques)
Newborn - 24 months: $550
2T - 5T: $600
6 - 8: $650
9 - 12: $700
Long gowns: $800

Super Over the Top Glitz (3024 AB Swarovski Rhinestones, Brooch stones, larger stones, major dress details, appliques and designs. Also includes bustle bow and necklace)
Newborn - 24 months: $1050
2T - 5T: $1100
6 - 8: $1250
9 - 12: $1300
Long gowns: $1400

Additional accessories are available:

Matching Hair Bows - $20.00
Matching Headband with Bow - $35.00
Matching Choker Necklace - $50.00
Matching Bustle Bow - $50.00
Matching Sock Ruffles - $20.00
Diaper Covers - $20.00

ANY OTHER QUESTIONS, PLEASE MESSAGE ME. I WILL BE HAPPY TO HELP YOU.

THANK YOU!
